name: http-auth-utils
description: Parse, build and deal with HTTP auth headers.

scripts.preversion: npm run compile && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel-register src/*.mocha.js src/**/*.mocha.js -R spec -t 5000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.cover: istanbul cover --report html _mochai-- --compilers js:babel-register src/*.mocha.js src/**/*.mocha.js -R spec -t 5000

author: Nicolas Froidure
